item.title: Degraded performance on TuneIn website and mobile apps
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Degraded Performance on TuneIn Website and Mobile Apps

Summary: TuneIn is experiencing degraded performance on their website and mobile apps due to an issue with their Core API. They have identified the root cause and are working on a fix. [Medium] - Slowness and Errors on TuneIn Website and Mobile Apps

Summary: TuneIn website and mobile apps are experiencing slowness and errors, which have been identified as being caused by an ongoing issue with their Core API. [Low] - Issue Resolved

Summary: The incident causing degraded performance on TuneIn's website and mobile apps has been resolved.

Oct 19, 11:05 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 19, 09:54 PDT
Identified - We have identified the root cause of this issue and are working to implement a fix. TuneIn website and mobile apps may still experience slowness and errors.

Oct 19, 09:44 PDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue affecting our Core API. This issue is causing degraded performance on the TuneIn website and mobile apps.

item.title: TuneIn Service Degradation
item.content:encoded:
Jun 29, 10:55 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 29, 10:53 PDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jun 29, 08:43 PDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jun 29, 08:41 PDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jun 29, 08:35 PDT
Investigating - We are currently experiencing service degradation to our services, we are actively investigating the issue. We will send updates as soon as they become available.
Thank you for your patience!

item.title: Issue with some news stations
item.content:encoded:
Jan 30, 04:00 PST
Resolved - We have identified an issue with a number of our free and premium news stations. We are working to restore content as soon as possible.

item.title: TuneIn Unavailable due to Widespread Cloudflare outage
item.content:encoded:
Jun 21, 00:22 PDT
Resolved - Cloudflare has implemented a fix and the issue is now resolved. We will continue monitoring this to ensure our services do not experience any further impact.

Jun 21, 00:08 PDT
Monitoring - Cloudflare has indicated that they have identified the root cause and have implemented a fix. We will continue to monitor this situation.

Jun 20, 23:34 PDT
Identified - Due to an ongoing issue with our CDN provider Cloudflare (a core dependency of TuneIn) A majority of our services are impacted and unavailable. We are working with Cloudflare to restore services as quickly as possible.

item.title: TuneIn Service Degradation
item.content:encoded:
Oct 1, 10:37 PDT
Resolved - This issue has been resolved.

Oct 1, 10:24 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are actively monitoring the situation.

Oct 1, 10:18 PDT
Identified - We have identified the root cause of this issue and are working to implement a fix.

Oct 1, 10:14 PDT
Investigating - We are investigating an issue affecting our APIs responsible for displaying and playing content on tunein.com and TuneIn mobile apps.

item.title: TuneIn Unavailable on Google Assistant Powered Devices
item.content:encoded:
Sep 16, 19:58 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 16, 19:38 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented for this and we are currently monitoring the results.

Sep 16, 19:11 PDT
Investigating - We have identified an issue affecting Google Assistant enabled devices. TuneIn is currently not available via voice commands on Google Assistant. We are actively investigating this issue and will provide updates as they become available.

item.title: News and Music Degraded Performance
item.content:encoded:
Feb 22, 11:32 PST
Resolved - This issue has been resolved. Stations should play normally now. Please reach out to support@tunein.com if you have any further issues.

Feb 22, 10:39 PST
Identified - TuneIn-hosted stations are back online; however, the HLS variant of these streams are still unavailable.

Feb 22, 09:44 PST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue affecting TuneIn music stations and premium news stations.

item.title: Playback issues with TuneIn Content
item.content:encoded:
Jan 5, 13:07 PST
Resolved - This issue has been resolved. If you have any further Issues, please contact support@tunein.com

Jan 5, 12:51 PST
Monitoring - We have identified the cause and have implemented a fix. We will be monitoring this situation to verify streams resume playing properly.

Jan 5, 12:41 PST
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue affecting TunIn music streams, as well as premium news.

item.title: Search functionality is in a degraded state
item.content:encoded:
Dec 1, 18:08 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Dec 1, 18:00 PST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Dec 1, 17:37 PST
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: Intermittent playback issues on free and premium news streams
item.content:encoded:
Aug 30, 05:00 PDT
Resolved - TuneIn's upstream provider is experiencing intermittent internet issues, this is resulting in intermittent playback issues on free and premium news streams.

item.title: Tunein.com playback issues on free version of news streams
item.content:encoded:
Aug 13, 12:00 PDT
Resolved - This is impacted the ad-supported, free versions of CNN, Fox News Talk and MSNBC on Tunein.com. TuneIn mobile apps and consumer electronics integrations were not impacted.

item.title: Service degradation - Core API
item.content:encoded:
Aug 12, 07:00 PDT
Resolved - TuneIn's mobile app, web app, and consumer electronics integrations were effectively unavailable from 6:56 AM - 7:53 AM PT.

item.title: Service degradation - Backend Streaming Platform
item.content:encoded:
Jul 21, 17:38 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jul 21, 15:32 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jul 21, 15:32 PDT
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Jul 21, 15:30 PDT
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jul 21, 15:29 PDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: Intermittent issues on Tunein.com
item.content:encoded:
Jun 30, 22:34 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 30, 22:05 PDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: Degraded functionality on login API calls
item.content:encoded:
Jun 4, 18:23 PDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jun 4, 17:20 PDT
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jun 4, 17:15 PDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jun 4, 17:05 PDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

item.title: CNN outage
item.content:encoded:
May 28, 15:00 PDT
Resolved - CNN was offline from 2:50 PM - 2:55 PM due to an issue with the source provider.

item.title: Service degradation - TuneIn.com and APIs
item.content:encoded:
Apr 1, 12:30 PDT
Resolved - TuneIn services were unavailable from approximately 12:33 PM - 12:38 PM PDT. This was due to an upstream outage at our CDN provider.

item.title: Service Degradation
item.content:encoded:
Mar 25, 10:04 PDT
Resolved - This issue has been resolved

Mar 25, 09:47 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been deployed and we are seeing our services return to a normal state. We will be carefully watching to ensure stability.

Mar 25, 08:57 PDT
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Mar 25, 08:56 PDT
Identified - We are investigating an issue impacting our web, mobile, and integrated devices.

item.title: TuneIn Outage
item.content:encoded:
Mar 21, 22:11 PDT
Resolved - This issue is now resolved

Mar 21, 21:04 PDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are currently monitoring the status.

Mar 21, 20:18 PDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an outage impacting tunein.com as well as our mobile applications.

item.title: Two minute outage on Tunein.com
item.content:encoded:
Mar 9, 13:30 PDT
Resolved - From 1:53 - 1:55 PM PT, Tunein.com was unavailable. We've identified the root cause and are working to deploy a permanent fix.

item.title: CNBC Premium Outage
item.content:encoded:
Feb 24, 13:00 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 24, 12:13 PST
Investigating - There is a nationwide outage at the provider of this stream. We'll update as more information becomes available.

item.title: Service degradation
item.content:encoded:
Feb 4, 18:35 PST
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Feb 4, 18:18 PST
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Feb 4, 18:13 PST

Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Nov 4, 17:46 PST

Nov 4, 17:46 PST

item.title: Increased Latency on Tunein Services
item.content:encoded:
Aug 15, 11:57 PDT
Resolved - TuneIn services have returned to a stable condition. we will continue to monitor this to verify full functionality.

Aug 15, 11:29 PDT
Monitoring - We have implemented a fix for this issue and are currently monitoring the situation.

Aug 15, 11:06 PDT
Investigating - We are investigating some issues causing degraded performance of TuneIn.com and our Core API's. We are working to maintain stability across our platform and will update when we have more information. Thank you for your patience.

item.title: Service Degradation
item.content:encoded:
Aug 15, 09:50 PDT
Resolved - A fix was implemented as of 4:50 AM PT and this issue is resolved.

Aug 15, 01:51 PDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Aug 15, 00:27 PDT
Investigating - Streams are currently unavailable. We're working on a fix.
